item.title: Commodores - Easy
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Lionel Richie
KY: 8493 / KY: 20646

Know it sounds funny
but I just can’t
Stand the pain
girl I’m leaving
You tomorrow
seems to me girl
You know I’ve
done all I can
You see I begged
stole and I borrowed
Yeah woo
that’s why I’m easy
I’m easy like
Sunday morning
That’s why I’m easy
I’m easy like
Sunday morning
why in the world
Would anybody
put chains on me
I’ve paid
my dues to make it
Everybody
wants me to be
What they
want me to be
I’m not happy when
I try to fake it
No! woo
that’s why I’m easy
I’m easy like
Sunday morning

I’m easy like
Sunday morning
I wanna be
High so high
I wanna be
Free to know
the things
I do are right
I wanna be free
Just me
whoa-

That’s why I’m easy

that’s why I’m easy

easy like
